distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for wpa_supplicant fixes the following issues:
	  
- CVE-2022-23303: Fixed side-channel attacks in SAE (bsc#1194732).
- CVE-2022-23304: Fixed side-channel attacks in EAP-pwd (bsc#1194733).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The implementations of SAE in hostapd before 2.10 and wpa_supplicant before 2.10 are vulnerable to side channel attacks as a result of cache access patterns. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2019-9494.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.title: Vulnerability description
